In England, in the seven days to 06 June, there were 30,385 new confirmed cases (54.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 30 May, there were 19,036 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 60% (11,349 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 11 June is 3,968,986 (7,051.3 cases per 100,000 population).
